testingEnforcement.description: Ensures testing is completed before marking tasks as done

requirements: testStrategy must be defined and non-empty
All tests in testStrategy must be executed
Test results must be documented in task details
All subtasks must have completed their testing requirements

validationSteps: Verify testStrategy field exists and contains specific test cases
Check that test execution is documented in task details
Ensure all subtasks have completed testing before parent task completion
Confirm test results are satisfactory (no failing tests)
testingEnforcement.errorMessage: Task cannot be marked as complete until all testing requirements are fulfilled. Please ensure: 1) testStrategy is defined, 2) tests are executed, 3) results are documented, 4) all subtasks tested.
